manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Refresh your bathroom with American Soft Linen's 100% Turkish Cotton Towels and redefine your expectations of Comfort and Luxury. Experience the epitome of Softness and Elegance in your own home. Try your 6 Piece Towel Set today and enjoy the comfort you deserve.

100% Turkish Cotton refers to towels made from cotton grown and harvested in Turkey, renowned for its exceptional quality and long fibers. This results in towels that are Soft, Absorbent, and Durable. Its long fibers make it highly Absorbent, allowing it to Quickly and Effectively Dry your Body.

100% Turkish Cotton 6 Piece Towel Set includes 2 Bath Towels of 27" x 54", 2 Hand Towels of 16" x 28" and 2 Washcloths of 13" x 13". This Bathroom Towel Set is providing you with a complete assortment of towels for your bathroom needs.

Turkish Cotton has longer fibers, resulting in a smoother and more luxurious texture, allowing the towel to give a gentle and soothing feel against the skin. The soft fibers of the towel create more surface area for water absorption, allowing it to effectively wick away moisture from the body.
Experience the softness and warmth of the fluffy body towels after shower. You won't want to leave these soft, absorbent and fluffy towels with you anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Comfort for Your Everyday Routine!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I recently upgraded my bathroom essentials with the American Soft Linen Luxury Bathroom Towels, and I am beyond impressed with the quality and comfort they bring to my daily routine.The 100% Turkish cotton construction of these towels is nothing short of exceptional. The material is incredibly soft and plush, providing a luxurious feel against the skin. The towels are not only absorbent but also quick-drying, making them a practical and efficient choice for busy mornings or post-shower indulgence.What sets these towels apart is the remarkable durability. After multiple washes, they maintain their softness and color vibrancy, showing no signs of wear and tear. The generous sizing ensures full coverage and a spa-like experience every time I use them.The attention to detail in the design is evident. The subtle yet sophisticated pattern adds a touch of elegance to my bathroom, making these towels both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The quality craftsmanship is a testament to the brand's commitment to delivering a premium product.I appreciate the value of having a set of towels that not only meets but exceeds expectations. The American Soft Linen Luxury Bathroom Towels have become an integral part of my daily self-care routine, providing a comforting and indulgent experience. If you're in search of high-quality, long-lasting towels that combine luxury with practicality, look no further. These towels are a five-star addition to any bathroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these towels! But, as with most new towels, they are manufactured with a coating that almost repels water and causes a lot of lint. I’ve seen a lot of the reviews complaining of this issue. You MUST do this to rid the towels of the excess lint!…..BEFORE washing them, put them in the dryer and use the no-heat setting. My dryer says “Refresh”. Just a cool temperature. Run the dryer for 30-50 minutes and you’ll see the lint collecting in the trap. Empty trap after each run. I used five cycles until there was barely any lint left in the trap (See picture). And there was a lot! After that, wash the towels with a cup of white vinegar or 1/2 cup of baking soda (dissolved in warm water first) in your washer on hot water setting . **NO detergent or softener!!** Dry on medium heat. The result is lint free, absorbent, soft as clouds, Turkish cotton towels. This should be done with all new 100% cotton towels! I learned this from my mother and it’s fail proof. Please consider this before writing negative reviews. These towels are high quality, incredibly soft and absorbent. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, Soft, Absorbent Towels!
reviews.reviewText: These are great towels and good quality as well. I love the "Colonial Blue" color, which is more of a dark teal green color. It goes great in my bathroom and matches my dark teal shower curtain almost perfectly!These towels have stayed very soft, and are very absorbent as well. Yes, they DO shed for the first couple of washes. Do yourself a favor, and wash them in COLD water with good detergent and NO fabric softener, then dry them on LOW heat without using dryer softener sheets. You may need to do this 2-3 times before you use them. Then, the shedding stops. If you follow these guidelines, they stay really soft and don't shed.Because they are a little heavier quality, they do take a little while to dry when hanging after a shower. I run a tower fan aimed in from the doorway of my bathroom for an hour or so after showering to help them and my bathroom to stay dry (I don't have a window I can open).I will be buying more of these towels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect such wonderful towels for the price paid....but I am so surprised. Love these towels, they are thick and soft. Like fancy hotel towels, but not the price of them. Once washed they fluffed up amazingly. They did not bleed much at all, I bought the royal purple and expected a lot of dye bleed. Also I read some issues with lint, I have had minimal lint issues. I did wash these the first time with no softener then dried, then washed again with softener. They are just so fluffy! If you are looking for a light weight towel this isn't for you then. Being they are nice and thick I feel they have a nice weight. Not too heavy though. If I need new towels I will be purchasing more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine Bath Towels
reviews.reviewText: These American Soft Linen towels are indeed soft and large and are a pleasure to use. They are very absorbent and dry me off quickly. I wash all 12 of my towels together in one load. I use cold water and add just a touch of fabric softener. I toss one dryer sheet in the dryer and it does take them awhile to dry. They also leave quite a bit in the lint trap. But I’m very happy with these towels and like the fact that there are many different colors to choose from. I will order them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Black towels add a touch of sophistication to my bathroom. The deep color not only looks elegant but also maintains its richness after multiple washes. The practicality of black towels lies in their ability to conceal stains and wear, keeping them looking newer for longer. These towels, with their soft and absorbent qualities, combine both style and functionality, making them a sleek addition to any bathroom decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've slowly been replacing all my towels with new. Ordered these, hopeful that they would be good enough quality and was pleasantly surprised. Biggest reason why I'm replacing all my old towels is because I hadn't really followed wash instruction on them, and most had lost their softness and absorption capabilities. Already washed these a few times (properly) and can tell they will hold up. They are still nice and fluffy like they were when I first took them out of the bag. Will be replacing the rest of my towels with this same brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and think but not colorfast
reviews.reviewText: These towels are a nice thickness and very soft, but they bleed like crazy. Even after multiple washes, the dye is still rinsing out. It’s annoying having to separate them from all our other laundry (including other towels) because they’ll discolor everything else.
Bought this towel for my mother in law. She loves the quality of the towel. She likes that is soft and big. Delivery was fast.
El precio es excelente comparándolas con las que venden en tienda departamentales mucho más caras. Las recomiendo ampliamente.
Douce,épaisse,bonne couleur, bonne grandeur,se nettoie bien. Reste belle.

reviews.reviewerName: Me encantó !!  Buena potencia de aire , varias funciones de luz, y se ve muy lindo
reviews.reviewText: Me gustaron mucho , color y textura de calidad .
Absorben perfectamente el agua, lo recomiendo ampliamente, tamaño perfecto. Calidad supera al precio.
